page.title: 18LIFE IN NEWHAM
page.content: Life in Newham is good sometimes and boring othertimes. It is good when clubs are open like the Mayflower and Gannon Point club and when the parks are open as you can hire a tennis court. Also my friends and neighbours are friendly. But where I live there is a public house and the music is too loud of a night time, and we get a lot of boys come round my way and play tennis so no one can play downstairs. I live in a maisonette, we have not got a garden or a small balcony so you feel shut in a bit. I would like to move but only round this way because my school is here and so is my friends and family.
